mapper.insert: insert into course(user_id, name, author, price, description, sub_name, image_url, content_url) values (#{userId}, #{name}, #{author}, #{price}, #{description}, #{subName}, #{imageUrl}, #{contentUrl});
mapper.update: update course set name=#{name}, author= #{author}, price=#{price}, description= #{description}, sub_name=#{subName}, image_url=#{imageUrl}, content_url=#{contentUrl}, statu=#{statu}, checked=#{checked} where course_id = #{courseId};
mapper.select: SELECT u.email FROM user u JOIN course c ON u.user_id = c.user_id WHERE c.course_id = #{courseId};
